description.translate: The distance becomes subjective, the altitude anodyne, the speed affable, when the knowledge of Iio's children carries you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Capuche des songes\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aLa distance devient subjective, l'altitude anodine, la vitesse\"}","{\"text\":\"§aaffable, quand vous porte le savoir des enfants d'Iio.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aThe distance becomes subjective, the altitude anodyne, the speed\"}","{\"text\":\"§aaffable, when the knowledge of Iio's children carries you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a3 §7DAR§c-1\"}"],color:12696977}}
